description: Built a decentralized borrowing protocol as a side project using Solidity and Hardhat for smart contracts. Integrated contracts into a React + TypeScript frontend with wagmi, RainbowKit, and ethers.js to enable wallet connection, deposits, borrowing, repayments, and withdrawals.
Developed interactive data visualization dashboards for enterprise clients. Created reusable chart components, optimized rendering performance, and collaborated with backend teams to integrate APIs.
Contributed to widely used open-source projects by submitting pull requests:
Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering. Focused on web development, distributed systems, and blockchain. Thesis on blockchain applications in capital markets and shares.
